channel.title: Client.class Error Can't get my 317 Webclient up. Help please? ERROR CODE AVAIL!
channel.description:
Client base: Bluur(has the little menu bar and shit on the top) Source: Delta
I've followed Ric's tutorial perfectly. I've tried the tutorial at least 10 times and I'm still getting the same error when I try to load my webclient.
Error: [code] load: class client.class not found. java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass0(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class [/code]
I've tried uploading my .jar file without client.class included, but I'm still getting the same error.
My webhost shows that the cache stream is working correctly. I just don't understand why I can't get rid of the error no matter what I do..
Help please!

item.title: Client.class Error Can't get my 317 Webclient up. Help please? ERROR CODE AVAIL!
item.dc:creator: @legit_99 legit 99
item.description:
@legit_99 wrote:

The tutorial says to create a new html page with

<HTML>
<HEAD>
<TITLE>Your Webclient</TITLE>
<META HTTP-EQUIV="PRAGMA" CONTENT="NO-CACHE">
</HEAD>

<BODY>

<applet name="yourclientname" width="765" height="503" archive="client.jar" code="client.class">
<param name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx1024m">
</applet>

</BODY>
</HTML>

That’s done. My client.jar is uploaded and everything seems to be perfect. But it’s not working -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Client.class Error Can't get my 317 Webclient up. Help please? ERROR CODE AVAIL!
item.dc:creator: @legit_99 legit 99
item.description:
@legit_99 wrote:

Client base: Bluur(has the little menu bar and shit on the top)
Source: Delta

I’ve followed Ric’s tutorial perfectly. I’ve tried the tutorial at least 10 times and I’m still getting the same error when I try to load my webclient.

Error:

load: class client.class not found.
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class
	at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
	at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass0(Unknown Source)
	at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
	at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
	at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source)
	at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source)
	at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class

I’ve tried uploading my .jar file without client.class included, but I’m still getting the same error.

My webhost shows that the cache stream is working correctly. I just don’t understand why I can’t get rid of the error no matter what I do…

Help please!

Read full topic
